sections.heading: to 60-6D-8 - Repealed.
sections.text:
Repeals.— Laws 1999, ch. 277, § 15 repealed 60-6D-1 to 60-6D-8 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1993, ch. 68, §§ 28 to 35, relating to alcohol server education, effective July 1, 1999. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1997 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

Laws 1999, ch. 277, §§ 2 through 13 enacted a new Alcohol Server Education Article of the Liquor Control Act and assigned those provisions as 60-6D-11 to 60-6D-22 NMSA 1978. Those sections were recompiled as 60-6E-1 to 60-6E-12 NMSA 1978 for clarity.
